6.1.17  1:50 pm   There are several times in which someone asks a question referencing one of your videos, and you respond that you don't know what they're talking about.

      I know that you understand the piano shaving questions, but do you actually not understand the reference, or are you just messing with people. Thanks. Or no thanks. It depends on whether or not you answer my question.

I wish I could get to know you personally as you always seem so interesting and insightful, but then again, so do so many other people. Alas, if only I'd found your content earlier.
